summary: A mute hit-man vows to kill only the rude, and save up enough money for tongue surgery.
cast: Ha-kyun Shin|Ji-hye Yun|Min-Joon Kim|Kim Byeong-Ok|Su-hee Go|Ye-rin Han|Man-sik Jeong|San Kang|Eung-soo Kim|Kwang-il Kim|Tae-won Kwon|Han-wi Lee|Kil-soo Park|Min-Gyu Park|Jin-gu Yeo
title: Yeui-eomneun geotdeul
